issue.title: [C++] DictionaryBuilder should support bootstrapping from an existing dict type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4776](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4776). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would mean adding a new DictionaryBuilder constructor that receives a dictionary type and performs a lazy deep copy if there's any modification. We'll have to investigate how this translate in API ergonomics.
